idea-plugin.name: DynamicReturnTypePlugin
idea-plugin.description:
Intellij/Phpstorm PHP plugin to allow a dynamic return type from method/function calls. It can use either the instance type of the passed parameter or a string lookup. Full documentation with examples on github page. Can be configured for :
  • Instance method calls
  • Static method calls
  • Function calls
Accepts the following to calculate return type
  • Parameter object instance( eg. new \DOMDocument() as a parameter instance value will infer a DOMDocument will be returned )
  • Parameter string type ( eg. '\DOMDocument' as a parameter string value will infer a DOMDocument will be returned )
  • Class constants that resolve to __CLASS__ will resolve similar to the ::class feature in 5.5 behaves.

Configuration

Example dynamicReturnTypeMeta.json configuration in project root 
    {
        "methodCalls": [
            {
                "class": "\\Phockito",
                "method": "mock",
                "position": 0
            },
             {
                "class": "\\Phockito",
                "method": "verify",
                "position": 0
            }
        ],
        "functionCalls": [
            {
                "function": "\\verify",
                "position": 0
            },
            {
                "function": "\\mock",
                "position": 0
            }
        ]
    }
Position is the parameter index to infer the return type from.
Classes and function names must be fully qualified with a leading \ as per example.
Static method calls should behave the same as instance calls.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.1

  • Cache internal look ups for method calls in inheritance look ups as phpindex can lockup on some actions

1.0.2 ( make compatible with 6.0.3 open api changes so major restructuring, please leave a comment if any problems )

  • Configuration changes of the dynamicReturnTypeMeta.json configuration file in the root are done on the save event so may be sticky, open configuration add a space and save if sticks.
  • Please keep an eye on methods that have the same names return type being overwritten, if not a complete match it should defer back to the original return type.
  • Should now be lock up safe due to the api changes and internal restructuring.
